mapper.select: select count(*) from certification_board where member_no=#{member_no} and to_char(cer_date,'yy/mm/dd') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yy/mm/dd')

select cer.no,cer_status,cer_thumbnail,cer_content, cer_date , nickname , cer_hit, cer_like from (select cer.no,cer_status,cer_thumbnail,cer_content, cer_date , nickname , cer_hit, cer_like from certification_board cer, member m where m.no=cer.member_no and member_no=#{member_no} ) cer left outer join img i on i.cer_no = cer.no order by CER_DATE

select cer.no,cer_thumbnail,cer_content, cer_date , nickname ,cer_status,cer_hit, cer_like , i.no,img_name from (select cer.no,cer_thumbnail,cer_content, cer_date , nickname,cer_status,cer_hit, cer_like from certification_board cer, member m where m.no=cer.member_no and cer.no=#{cer_no}) cer left outer join img i on i.cer_no = cer.no
mapper.update: update certification_board set cer_hit=cer_hit+1 where no=#{no}
mapper.insert: insert into certification_board values( seq_cer.nextval, #{cer_status}, #{cer_content}, sysdate, 0, 0, #{member_no}, #{chg_user_no}, #{cer_thumbnail} )
